document_data.mainbody:
Yonni was a Cashguard in the employ of the Counting House of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Yonni was a human woman with tan skin and gray eyes. As a Cashguard, she wore a set of uniform breastplate armor and a helmet. Yonni was armed with a two-handed heavy crossbow.
In the , Cashguard Yonni was tasked with guarding and patrolling the private docks that belonged to the Counting House in the Lower City, alongside a number of fellow Cashguards and the citys steel watchers.
